snippet: Pence broke his left forearm and will be sidelined six to eight weeks after being hit by a pitch in the San Francisco Giants’ 8-6 win over a Chicago Cubs split squad.
abstract: San Francisco Giants outfielder Hunter Pence is sidelined with broken arm after being hit by pitch; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pence broke his left forearm and will be sidelined six to eight weeks after being hit by a pitch in the San Francisco Giants’ 8-6 win over a Chicago Cubs split squad.
